definition: to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: B:I took off my shirt and my watch and jumped into the water.
sentences.chinese: 我脱掉上衣，解下手表，跳进水里。

sentences.english: Women need to get out of damp sports bras quickly.
sentences.chinese: 女人们需要快速脱掉浸湿的运动胸罩。

sentences.english: When he saw me, he took off his hat with an air of gorgeous servility .
sentences.chinese: 他看到我，脱掉帽子，满脸都是阿谀的神色。

sentences.english: Mary's shoes were full of water so she took then off.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉的鞋都是水所以她干脆脱掉。

sentences.english: You have to take off your shoes before getting into the computer room.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，在进入微机室之前，你得先把你的鞋子脱掉。

sentences.english: It appears that in the face of chemical or biological warfare, a woman's primary job is to doff her clothes.
sentences.chinese: 若爆发生化战争，女人首当其冲要做的就是脱掉衣服。

sentences.english: Why don't you take your padded coat off?
sentences.chinese: 你干吗不把棉大衣脱掉？

sentences.english: Why not take off your coat? It 's hot inside the room.
sentences.chinese: 你怎么不把大衣脱掉呢？屋子里很热呀。

sentences.english: He would take off all his blue clothes and lay them at my feet.
sentences.chinese: 他脱掉了一身蓝色衣服，并把它们放在我的脚上。

sentences.english: She drew off the boots and put them, lolling side by side.
sentences.chinese: 她脱掉靴子，并且把两只鞋子靠在一起，放好。

sentences.english: I quickly stripped my jeans off myself.
sentences.chinese: 我飞快地把我的牛仔裤脱掉。

sentences.english: I would like to have had the uniform off although I did not care much about the outward forms.
sentences.chinese: 我是不拘外表形式的，但我倒很想把这军装脱掉。

sentences.english: Take off your wet shoes, please.
What I see are lot of Chinese men would not take off their underwear until the last moment.
sentences.chinese: 很多中国人不到最后关头是不会脱掉底裤的。

sentences.english: Then he pulled off his shoes and lay down.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他脱掉鞋子，躺了下去。

sentences.english: You must comply with it- take off those boots youwear, and draw on these of mine.
sentences.chinese: 你得照办＿＿脱掉脚上的靴子，穿上我的。

definition: to take off (trousers)/to drop one's pants
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
to put on (clothes)/to put (clothes) back on
